title: Stream Completion
description: Contract for stream executor output. Validated by bin/validate-pipeline-output after each stream completes.

status.description: Overall stream outcome. Only 'complete' advances the DAG without intervention.

steps.description: Ordered list of steps executed within this stream.

name.description: Step identifier within the stream pipeline. Well-known values: se, commit_impl, test, commit_test. Extensible â€” new steps (e.g., security_scan, integration_test) require no schema change.

error.description: Error message if status is 'failed'. Empty or absent for passed/skipped.

output_file.description: Path to structured output file produced by this step (e.g., se_go_output.json).

git_sha.description: Git HEAD SHA after stream completion. Validated against actual git state.

files_modified.description: Relative paths of all files created or modified. Validated against git diff.

output_files.description: Paths to structured output JSONs produced (e.g., se_go_output.json). Validated for existence.

build_passed.description: Whether language-specific build check passed after implementation.

tests_passed.description: Whether all tests passed after test writing step.

tests_total.description: Total number of test cases run.

tests_failed.description: Number of test cases that failed.

attempt.description: Which attempt this is (1 = first try, 2+ = retry).

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when stream execution began.

completed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when stream execution finished.
